titles.title: Providing for consideration of a joint resolution appointing the day for the convening of the second session of the One Hundred Seventh Congress.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 107-351, by Mr. Hastings (WA).

Rule provides for consideration of H.J. Res. 80 with 1 hour of general debate. Previous question shall be considered as ordered without intervening motions except motion to recommit with or without instructions.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 117.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 322.
The previous question was ordered without objection.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 12/20/2001--Passed House without amendment. Sets forth the rule (closed) for the consideration of a joint resolution appointing the day for the convening of the second session of the 107th Congress.
